title: Pork Belly - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Bickering Couple   Character Growth   Fat to Fit   Gangs   Modern Day
author: Samk
description: Ha-Jung meet Pork Belly when they are in sixth grade. They have their ups and downs, but they become good friends. When they meet again, it is in a gay bar where Ha-Jung works, out of desperation for money.>
